original_text: And she shall put the raiment of her captivity from off her, and shall remain in thine house, and bewail her father and her mother a full month: and after that thou shalt go in unto her, and be her husband, and she shall be thy wife.
korean_text: 또 포로의 의복을 벗고 네 집에 살며 그 부모를 위하여 한 달 동안 애곡한 후에 네가 그에게로 들어가서 그의 남편이 되고 그는 네 아내가 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: And she shall put the raiment of her captivity from off her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 포로였을 때의 옷을 벗을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and shall remain in thine house
and bewail her father and her mother a full month
sentences.korean_translation: 한 달 동안 그녀의 아버지와 어머니를 애도할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and after that thou shalt go in unto her
and she shall be thy wife
